entry.value: Select tm.id, tm.lookupcode, tm.lookupcodeid, tm.language, tm.value, tm.orderby from SIMO_METADATA tm where tm.SERVICENAME = 'OMS' group by tm.LOOKUPCODE, tm.ORDERBY, tm.ID, tm.LOOKUPCODEID, tm.LANGUAGE, tm.VALUE order by tm.LOOKUPCODE,tm.ORDERBY, tm.VALUE

Select tm.id, tm.lookupcode, tm.lookupcodeid, tm.language, tm.value, tm.orderby, tm.servicename, tm.show_yn from SIMO_METADATA tm where tm.LOOKUPCODE = :LOOKUPCODE and tm.SERVICENAME = 'OMS' group by tm.LOOKUPCODE, tm.ORDERBY, tm.ID, tm.LOOKUPCODEID, tm.LANGUAGE, tm.VALUE, tm.SERVICENAME, tm.SHOW_YN order by tm.LOOKUPCODE,tm.ORDERBY, tm.VALUE

Select tm.id, tm.lookupcode, tm.lookupcodeid, tm.language, tm.value, tm.orderby, tm.servicename, tm.show_yn from SIMO_METADATA tm where tm.LOOKUPCODE = :LOOKUPCODE and tm.LOOKUPCODEID = :LOOKUPCODEID and tm.SERVICENAME = 'OMS'
Select r.id, r.role_id, r.status, r.configuration, r.regis_inf_dt, r.lchg_inf_dt from SIMO_ROLE r where r.ROLE_ID = coalesce(:ROLE_ID, r.ROLE_ID) and r.STATUS = coalesce(:status, r.status)

Select ur.id, ur.user_id, ur.role_id, ur.status, ur.regis_inf_dt, ur.lchg_inf_dt from SIMO_USER_ROLE ur where ur.USER_ID = coalesce(:USER_ID, ur.USER_ID) and ur.ROLE_ID = coalesce(:ROLE_ID, ur.ROLE_ID) and ur.STATUS = coalesce(:status, ur.status)

Select distinct m.id, m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_url, m.role_id, m.mode, m.method , m.description, m.status, m.configuration, m.regis_inf_dt, m.lchg_inf_dt from SIMO_AUTH_MENU m inner join SIMO_USER_ROLE ur on m.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.USER_ID = :USER_ID and m.STATUS = 'A' and ur.STATUS = 'A'

Select fh.id, fh.file_name, fh.file_type, fh.file_upload_dt, fh.process_status, fh.total_count, fh.success_count, fh.file_valid_count, fh.remark, fh.file_status, fh.template_code, fh.regis_inf_dt, fh.lchg_inf_dt, fh.regis_user, fh.lchg_user from SIMO_FILE_HIS fh where fh.FILE_NAME = coalesce(:fileName, fh.FILE_NAME) and fh.FILE_UPLOAD_DT = coalesce(:fileUploadDt, fh.FILE_UPLOAD_DT) and fh.FILE_STATUS = coalesce(:fileStatus, fh.FILE_STATUS)

Select fh.id, fh.file_name, fh.file_type, fh.file_upload_dt, fh.process_status, fh.total_count, fh.success_count, fh.file_valid_count, fh.remark, fh.file_status, fh.template_code, fh.regis_inf_dt, fh.lchg_inf_dt, fh.regis_user, fh.lchg_user from SIMO_FILE_HIS fh where 1 =1 and fh.FILE_NAME = coalesce(:fileName, fh.FILE_NAME) and fh.FILE_UPLOAD_DT >= coalesce(:fileUploadDt_, fh.FILE_UPLOAD_DT) and fh.FILE_UPLOAD_DT <= coalesce(:fileUploadDtEnd, fh.FILE_UPLOAD_DT) and fh.TEMPLATE_CODE = coalesce(:templateCode, fh.TEMPLATE_CODE) and fh.FILE_STATUS = coalesce(:fileStatus, fh.FILE_STATUS)

Select fd.id, fd.template_code, fd.file_name, fd.file_upload_dt, fd.process_status, fd.file_type, fd.file_data, fd.remark, fd.row_number, fd.cif, fd.acount_no, fd.account_name, fd.personal_id, fd.regis_user, fd.regis_inf_dt, fd.lchg_user, fd.lchg_inf_dt from SIMO_FILE_DETAIL_HIS fd where fd.FILE_NAME = coalesce(:fileName, fd.FILE_NAME) and fd.FILE_UPLOAD_DT = coalesce(:fileUploadDt, fd.FILE_UPLOAD_DT) and fd.PROCESS_STATUS = coalesce(:processStatus, fd.PROCESS_STATUS) and fd.TEMPLATE_CODE = coalesce(:templateCode, fd.TEMPLATE_CODE) and (cast(:cif as varchar) is null or fd.CIF = cast(:cif as varchar)) and (cast(:accountNo as varchar) is null or fd.ACOUNT_NO = cast(:accountNo as varchar)) and (cast(:personalId as varchar) is null or fd.PERSONAL_ID = cast(:personalId as varchar)) order by fd.ID desc OFFSET :offset ROWS FETCH NEXT :limit ROWS ONLY
